channel.title: NO-IP question
channel.description:
Hello,
I am currently busy setting up a moparscape server on my server-pc, but all the guides tell me I have to use NO-IP for the server. I already have my IP linked to a "site" and have all the ports forwarded on my router, so so I still have to use NO-IP? I would rather not use it, because I don't want to install too much programs on my server.

item.title: NO-IP question
item.dc:creator: @Masam279 Masam279
item.description:
@Masam279 wrote:

You dont have to use NO-IP, its just recommended to mask your real ip from hackers because your hosting a server

Read full topic
